document.full_text: the european union agreed on friday to impose sanctions on up to 14 syrians for their part in a government crackdown against protesters, but president bashar al-assad was not among those immediately targeted.
document.title: eu agrees to sanctions against syrian officials
lines_and_colors: the european union agreed on friday to impose sanctions on up to 14 syrians for their part in a government crackdown against protesters, but president bashar al-assad was not among those immediately targeted.
